summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Lip Mask is an innovative, night treatment lip mask that consists of a blend of botanical extracts and oils that moisturizes overnight, for supple and hydrated lips by morning.
details: DetailsBenefitsQuenches thirsty lips day or nightKey IngredientsAcai Berries: incredible anti-ageing agents that are rich in Vitamin C, Vitamin A, Omega-3, Omega- 6, and Omega-9 fatty acidsVanilla: sweet, uplifting and relaxing scent for your best beauty sleepItem 2609962How To UseApply a generous layer onto your lips in the evening for overnight hydration or in the daytime for 24 hour moisture.#MBSKINTIP: Use it as lip prep before swiping on lipstick for an easy glide and glossy look.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Polybutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sucrose Acetate / Stearate, Hydrogenated Styrene / Isoprene Copolymer, Synthetic Wax, Cocos Nucifera (Coconuut) Fruit Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Squalene, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrogenated Styrene / Butadiene Copolymer, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire Microcristalline), Carica Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Sambucus Nigra Fruit Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a generous layer onto your lips in the evening for overnight hydration or in the daytime for 24 hour moisture.#MBSKINTIP: Use it as lip prep before swiping on lipstick for an easy glide and glossy look.

reviews.headline: Big Yes
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm. I wish I'd discovered it years ago.

reviews.headline: Perfectly soft and hydrating lip mask!
reviews.comments:
I'm so glad I bought this! Putting it on is the last thing I do before getting into bed, and it's something I look forward to now! And I wake up with hydrated, happy lips! 

Feel: Very thick and gooey in the best way! Smooths onto lips effortlessly.

Value: A little definitely goes a long way, so the container will thankfully last quite a while. 

Smell: Heavenly! It's not overpowering or irritating.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: This lip mask is super thick and creamy! I put it on every night before bed and in the morning my lips are soft, plump and ready for lipgloss. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: GREAT product, GREAT value, a new staple!
reviews.comments:
I purchased the vanilla/acai scent, and, honestly, I wish I could get a perfume/scented balm form of this. It is flavorless on the lips, but has a subtle scent that is the perfect cross between a little fruity and your basic crowd-pleasing vanilla. If you are sensitive to scents, it is not strong enough to be overbearing. The product itself is wonderful. It's a bigger tub than I thought it would be (but still small enough to pretty easily fit in a pocket), and a little product goes a LONG way, so you're really getting your money's worth for this stuff. The formula itself really melts the instant it hits skin, so pick up less product than you think you'll need. It's hydrating, buttery smooth, and lasts longer than your average chapstick or lip balm.

This is definitely a little pricier for a drugstore product, but it's still not nearly as expensive as high-end products, and as I said, I'm confident it will last me quite a while. In my opinion, it's worth the price.

I recently picked up a birthday gift from another beauty store (Ulta literally won't let me type the brand name, but it starts with S- and ends in -ephora), which included a mini Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask. It's hyped up a lot, and it IS a nice product. First thing I noticed when I switched to the Laneige mask from the Mario Badescu one? I wanted to switch back. I'm really not terribly picky or hyper-aware of significant differences in product performance between things like skincare products since they can take a long time of consistent use to show ANY results. In this case, I noticed in under a DAY that I prefered the Mario Badescu mask.

If you're looking for a much cheaper alternative to the (full-size) Laneige mask that will probably last you longer? Look no further.

reviews.headline: nice feel
reviews.comments: I like this product, but the jar is larger than I would actually prefer.    I am using this during the day at home  due to severe dryness and peeling lips and do believe it is helping.

reviews.headline: Healed my extremely chapped lips
reviews.comments: I had extremely dry, chapped, painful lips for years and everything I used didn't work. After one night of this mask my lips were already softer. I can't believe how amazing this mask is. My lips are finally healed after a few days!

reviews.comments: I tried so many nighttime lip masks and this one blew me away. I absolutely love it!! My lips got severely chapped this winter and once I started using this, I don't even need to apply any chapstick during the day. And this lasts forever too!

reviews.comments: Amazing product! I've been using it at night along my night time skincare routine and I love it! It's been leaving my lips nourished and moisturized. It smells amazing and it actually works. I'll be repurchasing in the future. Very affordable too.

reviews.comments: I fell in love with this the minute I tried it (and subsequently the entire Mario Badescu brand). It goes on so smoothly, is effective at moisturing dry lips, and lasts a long time. It even looks great as a gloss on its own.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Lip mask is moisturizing! It's good over lipstick and lip stains, however best used before bed. In the morning my lips are extremely moisturized the next morning. I will buy again and again!

reviews.headline: Love love

It was also very hard to remove due to how sticky it was if you wanted to wash off the remainder in the morning. However after a month or so of using it religiously at night, my lips became dry that they burned in the mornings. A couple nights without using it and just using my normal chapstick, no more dry, burning lips in the morning. I like a lot of other Mario products, however this is a pass.
